lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We have enjoyed a very substantial increase in the market value of our investments over the course of this financial year, but we are concerned at the economic fundamentals which persist in Australia, particularly the high interest rates which currently apply," it said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We expect to enter 1988 in a highly liquid position and will be looking to take advantage of investment opportunities as they arise," it said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Nevertheless, Adsteam said it continues to be a large investor in the Australian market through its equity-accounted associates and through other major investments.
